name: The Adventure 2.0
description:
A story that weaves a distant future and the consequences of the choices of your ancestors. Use weapons, skills, timing and memory to make your way until you discover the whole truth. The three mysterious creatures are waiting for you!

To reach your goal you can upgrade yourself and your weapons, release a powerful special attack that inflicts altered states to enemies, change clothes to feel more comfortable, choosing between the two characters in the story, Ehro and Nehori.

Get ready and choose your tactics, timing or furious attack? Collide with ever stronger enemies, who will test your skills.
